resources.string: Created with care by Nithish Gajula

Thank you for choosing EasyMarkdown! This application is a personal project that I develop and maintain in my free time, and every bit of your support is genuinely appreciated. Whether itâ€™s help with design, icon creation, adding translations for different languages, or simply leaving a tip, any form of support makes a difference.

 If you encounter any issues with application, please feel free to reach out. And consider rating the app on the Play Store.

 Please note: In-app purchases for tips are a way to support development and do not unlock any additional features And Internet access permission is requested solely to retrieve embedded images from online sources only within your markdown.
